item.title: CEO killing latest: Mangione waives extradition, boards plane to New York
item.description: Luigi Mangione, the man accused of gunning down UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, waived extradition on Thursday morning.

item.title: WATCH: Rescue dogs pick their Christmas presents for 'Santa Paws Day'
item.description: The pups at Dogs Trust Ireland were in for a Christmas treat with all the gifts donated for "Santa Paws Day."
